page.title: 02DAILY ROUTINE IN HEMEL
page.content: The average start to my day is 7am when my alarm clock booms loudly every second. I then do the essential morning things, washing, dressing, making the bed etc. After completing these I sometimes do the mounds of washing up, and then participate in some early morning activity. After lunch I settle down to watch an afternoon film or something good on the video. After this I tidy my room and in the process find something interesting and ponder over it until I feel I must take back my overdue library books. In the evening I usually sneak off to my room, which my sister shares with me, to do some sewing or settle down to watch the screen of the telly.
